DOC.brief_summary: Women experience stillbirth neonatal death high risk repeat poor neonatal outcome short interpregnancy interval . Understanding attitude surround future fertility contraception population critical propose socially culturally acceptable intervention address unmet need family planning . Participants : Women experience stillbirth early neonatal death recruit postnatal ward Bwaila Maternity Hospital Lilongwe , Malawi . Procedures ( method ) : This qualitative study use 20 in-depth interview four focus group discussion 10 woman .
DOC.brief_title: Family Planning Intentions Practices Among Women With Poor Obstetric Outcome
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose qualitative study 60 woman experience stillbirth early neonatal death . This qualitative study use 20 in-depth interview four focus group discussion 10 woman . In-depth interview conduct Chichewa private room either within participant ' home another private location determine participant . Each interview take approximately 60-90 minute complete . The focus group discussion conduct private room health facility 6-10 participant . These take approximately 90-120 minute complete . Interviews focus group discussion audio-recorded , transcribed , translated English . If participant find eligible , invited participate study . After investigator complete in-depth interview , investigator analyze data modify focus group discussion guide need integrate new theme may emerge individual interview . The investigator recruit 6-10 woman per focus group ( 24 40 total ) hospital use recruit individual interview . The investigator search recurrent pattern theme data idea help explain presence pattern . The data collection analysis process design iterative , investigator review data collect adjust data collection instrument reflect new theme emerge data collection process . All interview audio-recorded , transcribed , translate , cod computerized analysis .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Current admission postpartum ward Bwaila Hospital , 2 . Women deliver stillborn fetus 28 week gestation birthweight > 1000 g experience neonatal demise liveborn infant , weigh > 1000 g first 7 day life , 3 . Ability speak Chichewa English fluently , 4 . Age 1845 year old . Exclusion criterion : Not willing audiorecorded Have experience stillbirth early neonatal death
